Name: Thunder Manifestation
Title: "Lingering Hatred" Thunder Manifestation
Desc: As long as the grudges of the land do not fade, so will the roaring thunder persist.
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Thunder Manifestation

24022.Name: Strifeful Lightning
24022.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT] to the opposing character affected by <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124022]</color>. (If there are no eligible opposing characters, deals DMG to the active character instead)

C124022.Name: Lightning Rod
C124022.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the attached character takes DMG from $[A2402] or its summons:</color> Remove this state, cause this DMG instance to increase by 1.\n(Only one of this status can exist on the field at once. Some of $[A2402]'s skills will target the character to which this is attached.)

C124023.Name: Thundering Shackles
C124023.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deals 3 $[K104] to the opposing character affected by <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124022]</color>. (If there are no eligible opposing characters, deals DMG to the active character instead)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color>

K104.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>
K104.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Superconduct</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Quicken</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

C124022.Name: Lightning Rod
C124022.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the attached character takes DMG from $[A2402] or its summons:</color> Remove this state, cause this DMG instance to increase by 1.\n(Only one of this status can exist on the field at once. Some of $[A2402]'s skills will target the character to which this is attached.)

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

24024.Name: Lightning Probe
24024.Desc: (Passive) When battle begins, create a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124021]</color> on the opponent's side of the field.

C124021.Name: Lightning Strike Probe
C124021.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After a character on whose side of the field this card is on uses a Skill:</color> Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124022]</color> to the active character on that side. (Once per Round)

C124022.Name: Lightning Rod
C124022.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the attached character takes DMG from $[A2402] or its summons:</color> Remove this state, cause this DMG instance to increase by 1.\n(Only one of this status can exist on the field at once. Some of $[A2402]'s skills will target the character to which this is attached.)
